attributes.review: I can’t open any ports and it will not allow me to enter my phone#. Or maybe there’s something wrong with my sight because I can’t see myself signing up for this garbage.
attributes.title: This app is horribly bugged

attributes.review: This app immediately fried my phone when I opened it. I have now purchased a new phone just so I could be sure to leave a review begging anyone who wants to download it not to do that!! Very dangerous.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever seen in my life! Terrible quality, glitchy, laggy, the works. And it kept showing me pictures of an Oompa Loompa! I’m disgusted by the quality, if I could leave 0 stars, I would. 🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: I got this app and lost my rights!!!

attributes.review: MAKE APPS GREAT AGAIN!!! This is a terrible excuse for an app. This app was so glitchy, I had to build a wall around my phone to make sure the glitch I was wouldn’t get into the United States of my Room. If I could give this app a negative star review I would. Absolutely HORRID FAKE APP.
attributes.title: MAGA

attributes.review:
This app is only used to promote hatred bigotry and violence all in an effort to support white supremacists and it’s hold on America and promote it within the criminal justice system and our culture. 
Don’t @ me about my grammar, this app is garbage.
attributes.title: If you support Donald Trump you’re a racist. Full stop.

attributes.review: this application took 24 hours to download... very hard to navigate and show the support i was hoping to show for my so very loving president 😌 he is just so caring and cares about all races and nationalities. the most non racist man i know! 🤍🤎🖤
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: this app took so long to download and not only CRASHED my phone but it got a VIRUS i thought it was fake like CoViD 19 and that bull sheet but no then my iphone caught on fire and burned my house down killing all my children and all the precious trump merch along with it, oh well 🤷‍♀️ DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: AWFUL APP!!!

attributes.review: I was expecting an amazing app to show my undeniable love for my president trumpy. Unfortunately I was disappointed over the fact that this app was actual trash. Anyways I’ll leave with this review. I love you my Cheeto puff 🥺💖💖💖💖💞💞💞💞😍😍🙈🙈🙈🙈
attributes.title: the apps actual garbage

attributes.review: I entered my phone number and it asked me to enter a valid number. I type my number in again very carefully and it still didn’t work. Do not get this app.
attributes.title: Didn’t even work

attributes.review: I am sorry to say but this app is just horrible with its layout and storage issues😱😱. Right away I could tell that this was not a reliable app and was extremely dissapointed. 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️ this is what you get for trying to ban Tik Tok
attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️HORRIBLE👎🏻😓🤢🤮🤮
